metadata.title: CVE-2021-47301 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:igb: Fix use-after-free error during resetCleans the next descriptor to watch (next_to_watch) when cleaning theTX ring.Failure to do so can cause invalid memory accesses. If igb_poll() runswhile the controller is reset this can lead to the driver try to freea skb that was already freed.(The crash is harder to reproduce with the igb driver, but the samepotential problem exists as the code is identical to igc)
